channel.title: Delta 317 webclient help - WEIRD error
channel.description:
ok so i used ric's webclient tutorial, had to do a little extra modifications in some places but i used it for the main cache downloading and extracting. the client is unusually organized with java files in the main folder, class files in a folder named bin, and sign and java zoom folders in the main folder. i jarred the main folder into a jar file which works when the cache is in the c:/ drive, but when it has to download the cache instead of NORMALLY saying like ------------------------------------ |||||| cache downloading - 20% | |||||| | ------------------------------------
instead it does something like :confused: :confused: :confused:
------------------------------------ | cache downloading - 12365% | | | ------------------------------------
for a second it has some random number over 1000 as the percentage, then it stops and gives me a connection error
it works when its not jarred, and i jarred it correctly. it also works when the cache is in the c:/ drive. has anyone experienced and error like this before? help is appreciated

item.title: Delta 317 webclient help - WEIRD error
